title: The Platypus and His Girlfriend
description: A fugitive, semi-aquatic special forces amateur stage magician, framed for a crime he didnâ€™t commit, the 1865 assassination of Abraham Lincoln, joins forces with his girlfriend to bring hope, justice, and varying degrees of aquaticness to a Tri-State area in peril.
quote: Now Mr. Mayor, I will saw the amazingly handsome Platy-dini in half.
